rows.label: tev000393_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh, man. Perfect timing, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0002
rows.name:
I came here to make a request of the Ma-non
regarding the hangars, but as you can see,
I've been kind of...detained.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0003
rows.name:
It's like they've never seen a Pathfinder before.
They just keep asking one tedious question after
the next about FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'd really like to cut this short and get back to work,
but I can't get a goddamn word in edgewise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0005
rows.name: What would you do if it were you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0006
rows.name: Flee[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0007
rows.name:
Suggest that Lao simply ignore the
questions and push his way free.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0008
rows.name: Play Along[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0009
rows.name: Suggest that Lao keep talking until they're satisfied.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0010
rows.name: Appeal[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0011
rows.name: Suggest that Lao try to grease the wheels with a pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0013
rows.name: Heh. I would if I could.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0014
rows.name:
I already tried to make a break for it once, and I
ended up with a Ma-non hanging off each arm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0015
rows.name:
They were like kids throwing a tantrum. But I didn't
want to start swinging 'em around and cause some
kind of diplomatic incident.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0017
rows.name:
You're a diligent [ST:gender p1=guy p2=girl ], [ST:playername ].
I admire about that you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0019
rows.name:
Yeah, that's a great idea and all, but it's not like I've
got a grenade pizza in my back pocket.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0020
rows.name:
Plus, if I tried to lead this throng down to the
commercial district to buy one, I'd just be
dragging this thing out even longer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0022
rows.name:
At times like this, I can't help but have second thoughts
about sharing our city with a bunch of xenoforms.
How do you feel about it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_JNK0040
rows.name: Positive[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_SEL0041
rows.name: Answer that you think it's wonderful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_JNK0050
rows.name: Neutral[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_SEL0051
rows.name: Answer that it has both risks and benefits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_JNK0060
rows.name: Negative[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_SEL0061
rows.name: Answer that you're concerned about all the downsides.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0030
rows.name: You really think so, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0031
rows.name: Don't get me wrongâ€”I've got nothing against Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0032
rows.name:
But if we'd never met any xenos, Earth would still be
around today, and we wouldn't be in this mess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0033
rows.name:
I know it's glib to say we'd all be better off if we'd
never met each other, but there's some truth to that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0034
rows.name:
Still, that doesn't mean there's any point in crying over
spilled milk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0035
rows.name: I have to do what I can to help move us forward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0037
rows.name:
Yeah, it hasn't been all lollipops and unicorns,
that's for sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0038
rows.name:
We've gained a lot of advanced technology, but the
xenos have subjected us to plenty of danger, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0039
rows.name:
I know it's glib to say we'd all be better off if we'd
never met each other, but there is some truth to that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0040
rows.name:
Still, that doesn't mean there's any point in crying over
spilled milk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0041
rows.name: I have to do what I can to help move us forward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0043
rows.name: Yeah. I hear you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0044
rows.name:
The xenos all have different languages, cultures, and
customs, and we've got no way of knowing what's
going on in those heads of theirs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0045
rows.name: How could you not worry about that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0046
rows.name:
But at the same time, I doubt humanity has much hope
of survival without their help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0047
rows.name:
I don't wanna say that we should use them, but...
let's just say it makes sense to, uh, join hands in the
spirit of cooperation. You follow?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0048
rows.name:
And we can't afford to be picky about which hands
we take, either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0050
rows.name:
Looks like the Ma-non have calmed down since we
started talking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0051
rows.name:
This may be my chance to slip back into the
administrative district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000393_MSG0052
rows.name: I'll see ya around, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]
